languages.text: Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a ranged attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each time the wearer deals damage to an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a ranged attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击，对至少5格之外的敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者会成为该敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击，对至少5格之外的敌人造成伤害时，装备者会成为该敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。

languages.text: Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} противнику дистанционной атакой на расстоянии 5 или более клеток, персонаж становится наиболее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для этого противника до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a ranged attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Нанося урон противнику {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой на расстоянии 5 или более клеток, персонаж становится наиболее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для этого противника до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Нанося урон противнику {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой на расстоянии 5 или более клеток, персонаж становится наиболее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для этого противника до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が5マス以上の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃で敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、使用者はこの敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}最優先ターゲット{/g}となる。
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が5マス以上の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃で敵にダメージを与えるたび、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、使用者はこの敵の最{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}となる。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador cause {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo con un ataque a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} desde un rango de 5 casillas o más, el portador se convierte en el mayor {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} para este enemigo hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador cause daño a un enemigo con un ataque a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} desde un rango de 5 casillas o más, el portador se convierte en el mayor {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} para este enemigo hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g} aus einer Reichweite von 5 Zellen oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} an einem Feind verursacht, wird der Träger bis zu seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zum ersten {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} dieses Feindes.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriff aus einer Reichweite von 5 Zellen oder mehr Schaden an einem Feind verursacht, wird der Träger bis zu seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zum ersten {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} dieses Feindes.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'il inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi par le biais d'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} à une portée de 5 cases ou plus, l'utilisateur devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de cet ennemi jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
languages.original_text: Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'il inflige des dégâts à un ennemi par le biais d'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} à une portée de 5 cases ou plus, l'utilisateur devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de cet ennemi jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

Chaque fois qu'il inflige des dégâts à un ennemi par le biais d'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} à une portée de 5 cases ou plus, l'utilisateur devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de cet ennemi jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
